entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
